content: to bind off knit 2 stitches pass the first stitch you made over the second stitch and off of your right-hand needle you have bound off one stitch repeat until you have bound off all stitches cut your yarn leaving approximately a 4 tail and pull the tail through the last stitch weave in your ends block and enjoy i d love to see your finished betty s bandana on instagram @oldehoeft and ravelry @eoldehoe
